::Sickle::

             Sickle was now shaped like a bird, and went going =
across the land.  He saw a ship.  A Maximal ship.  A transformer ship.  Sic=
kle moved towards the ship, and when it came close to the ship, it(Sickle, =
not the ship) floated around a bit.  Sickle saw a small crack in the ship, =
and decided to go in.  Sickle whisped in threw the tiny crack, and shaped i=
tself as a tiny speck.  It floated down the corridor, and then Sickle saw F=
eline.  Sickle was still the size of a little particle, so nothing could re=
ally see it.  Sickle, still small, landed on Feline's shoulder, and would s=
tay there to see more of this place.
